pages.title: The Setter
pages.text: To easily repair items while using them, craft some Raw Repairing Paste and cook it to get Repairing Paste.$(br)When in your off hand, it will slowly regenerate some durability of the item in your main hand, if possible.

pages.title: Heavy Ingots
pages.text: Repairing Paste will lose durability as it repairs. If you get various stacks of Repairing Paste with different durabilities, mix them together by having one on each hand.$(br2)When Repairing Paste loses all durability it will simple be consumed and disapear.
